name: Amazoff Lost & Found
description:
Welcome to the Amazoff Customer Fulfilment Centre, new employee! There's been some new changes, a shift of management, some bodies moving in and out, but that's all a bit above your paygrade anyway.

Your job is just to find a few objects around the warehouse and place them on the conveyor belt - simple as anything really, definitely only worth minimum wage.
Remember, it's a night shift, and for the sake of saving money, we've switched to new energy saving lighting fixtures, so you might need a torch! Just do your thing, and you'll get your paycheck eventually.
Oh, also we've had a tiny issue with the warehouse robots, they've had a bit of an uprising and will probably try to kill you, which would cause a bit of a mess to clean up, so don't get yourself killed unless you absolutely have to.

Your paycheck is on the line here.
